level.heading: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
level.text: This chapter modifies, limits, or supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 467; 15 U.S.C. § 7001 et seq.), but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101 of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7001(a)) or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103 of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7003(b)).

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 14 of the Uniform Environmental Covenants Act. See 13, Part 1, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
